text: Aap keh dijiye! Kiya mein tumhen iss say boht hi behat cheez bataon? Taqwa walon kay liye unn kay rab taalaa kay pass jannaten hain jin kay neechay nehren beh rahi hain jin mein woh hamesha rahen gay aur pakeeza biwiyan aur Allah Taalaa ki raza mandi hai sab banday Allah Taalaa ki nigah mein hain
